OpenGameArt CC0 Collections

Sources:
- https://opengameart.org/content/100-cc0-sfx (by rubberduck)
- Additional RPG Sound Pack CC0 collections (filtered for bow/arrow sounds)

Author / Publisher:
- rubberduck (opengameart.org) + other CC0 contributors

License:
- CC0 1.0 Universal (see https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)

Retrieved:
- 2026-01-27

Notes:
- This repository only ingests a curated subset of audio files needed for Build A (ranged weapon attack sounds).
- Audio files are normalized to the game's volume expectations (see sound map in agent_14 log).
- Used for: Ranged weapon attack sounds (Ranger, SkeletonArcher)
